entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -11.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
